content.text:
# Battle of Déols

| place             = Déols, Gaul
| result            = Visigothic victory
| combatant1        = Visigoths
| combatant2        = Britons and/or BretonsGallo-Romans
| commander1        = Euric
| commander2        = Riothamus?(possibly Ambrosius Aurelianus)
| strength1         = Unknown
| strength2         = Unknown
| casualties1       = Unknown
| casualties2       = Unknown
}}
The Battle of Déols was a battle  when Euric king of the Visigoths thwarted an attack by an alliance of Bretons or Britons of the Romano-British Riothamus and the Gauls.
